name: Fingerless mittens - wrist warmers
description: Fingerless mittens - wrist warmers approx 18 cm / 7" They fit medium and small hands. made to order Please check colour palette Hand wash, dry flat Every item is original, unique and carefully handcrafted by me, made with lots of love, just for you!

name: crochet baby shoes
description:
Adorable is the only way to describe these hand crocheted baby shoes! Made in a soft yarn with a two shades pink colored sole, they are just perfect for keeping a little one's feet cozy. Their design has such a versatility that you can use them both as a casual look or to dress up your baby's outfit. Not to mention they are as cute as can be which is why I enjoy making them so much! 
Each of the straps is fastened with a small button that complements the color of the booties.

You can also send me a message and I would be happy to work with you to create just what you're wanting!

Please select at checkout which of the following sizes you would like: 
(measurements are approximate) 
0 to 3 Months - sole length: 3 1/4 inches 
3 to 6 Months - sole length: 4 inches 
6 to 12 Months - sole length: 4 5/8 inches

Note: The age ranges listed above are suggested sizes but it is always best to measure your little one's feet if possible to ensure a correct fit.

Care: Hand wash in cold water and a mild soap, then reshape the shoes and let air dry.

***Although I firmly attach all buttons, please be aware that buttons can cause a choking hazard if swallowed. Please only have your baby wear these shoes while under supervision.***

name: owl hat
description:
Adorable crochet owl hat, that is custom made especially for you! You can also send me a message and I would be happy to work with you to create just what you're wanting!
All hats are made out of 100% wool free yarn.

Please be sure to measure for correct hat size.
Available hat sizes:
Size 0-3 months
Head Circumference 13” to 14”
Hat Height 5”

Infant 3 to 6 Months
Head Circumference 14” to 17”
Hat Height 6”

Baby 6 to 12 Months
Head Circumference 16” to 19”
Hat Height 6.5”

Toddler 12 Months – 3 Years
Head Circumference 18” to 20”
Hat Height 7”

Preschooler (around 3-5 years)
Head Circumference 19” to 20.5”
Hat Height 7.5”

Note: All sizes are as a guide only.

name: crochet coasters
description: Set of 6 crochet coasters in warm plum colour These attractive coasters are handmade using 100% Cotton. Each handmade coaster measures approximately 4" (Inches) across. As these coasters are made of 100% cotton they are easily washable if any spillages happen or just to freshen them up. Washing instructions are as follows: Handwash only. Do not dry clean. Cool iron (maximum 100°C) Do not use bleach. Do not tumble dry. Dry flat. As with any of my items if you would like to change the colour or would like a different size set please contact me. Please note -All computer screen colours can vary so the colour on screen may appear slightly different.
